mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRADE_HISTORY (TRADE_NUM, ACCOUNT_NUM, BALANCE, TRADE_TYPE, TRADE_AMOUNT, TRADE_DATE) VALUES (TRADE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{account_num}, (SELECT BALANCE FROM ACCOUNT_INFO WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM = #{account_num}) + #{trade_amount} , #{trade_type}, #{trade_amount}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_INFO SET BALANCE = BALANCE + #{trade_amount} WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM = #{account_num}
